website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive alternative for a sleek, frameless look, but some have complained of leaks.
pros: Glass is easy to keep clean
cons: A few customers have complained of leaks underneath the door

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Elegant, Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful shower door from start to finish. I didn't realize how thick 10mm is but this door is thick and HEAVY. This is not a DIY installation. I figured that out pretty quick and called in some professionals. Smart move. These doors must weigh 150 lbs a each. Installing them requires special equipment and the appropriate skillset. A handy guy with a toolbox is not going to be able to install these doors. Now that they are in I couldn't be happier. Super thick and super smooth. Exactly the right door for my newly-remodeled, custom shower.
customer_reviews.author: DesertDawg88

customer_reviews.title: Not for the average DIY'er
customer_reviews.text: I've installed many of these doors and they always have all the parts and fit right. The glass is heavy and if you are a DIY buyer I suggest you either rent some suction cups to hold the glass or have two to three pair of very strong hands. It doesn't take much to break a panel since it is tempered glass. besides that these doors save a customer nearly triple that of having a custom glass door installed by a local company. Also make sure you follow the directions, we have installed many but always check of each step that we've completed.
customer_reviews.author: Rockrunner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I am a contractor and have installed many shower doors in over 20 years and this is by far one of the best I have installed and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: William Hyde

customer_reviews.title: Blown away!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t be more happy with this shower inclosure. Fallowing the steps closely I found them easy to install. My shower walls are very crooked. almost 2” from floor to ceiling. It all went in much more smoothly then I expected. I am a single female and installed in by myself. It took me a full day on my own. It would have been a LOT easer with some help. The panels are VERY heavy and awkward. Heavy duty suction cups as well as using the styrofoam it was shipped in to rest the panels on and slide them around was helpful. I would recommend this to anyone looking. And it saved me over a thousand dollars!!!
customer_reviews.author: Landmark

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to install.
customer_reviews.text: We haven't has a chance to install yet but I know we'll love. Only disappointment so far is Amazon's chosen carrier to deliver. Unorganized customer service. From beginning to end. However the delivery guys were nice and took the doors to our bedroom verses leaving in living room. My husband is a great dyi so installation should not be a problem. These will enhance our remodeled master bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome frameless shower door option
customer_reviews.text: As a mechanical engineer perfectionist this was a straight forward install. Instructions we very easy and through. Might be a little much for average DIYer but if you take your time and don't rush, it would be manageable. Definitely get a good set of glass handling suction cups.
customer_reviews.author: Straight review

customer_reviews.title: Very good, extremely heavy glass doors.!
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised by the quality of these doors even after reading all the reviews. They are extremely heavy and durable. All of the parts were nice and labeled. And the doors have quality hardware. I had a minor problem installing The doors. This was probably due to the fact that I was overthinking it and didn’t want to ruin the installation. In other reviews I have read, they all said get a pair of suction cup glass handles. And I did. I got a pair for $20 on Amazon. They worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Man Project!
customer_reviews.text: Much heavier than 151 pounds. The bar slightly bent when the door was installed. Really Heavy. I still love the frameless door and the look it gives the shower. Glides smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Keith Mays

customer_reviews.title: Professional look for your bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Overall finished product looks amazing! Easy to install once you go through the directions. I would advise install some blocking where the door frame will be mounted, the door is very heavy. Really finished off the bathroom with a professional look.
customer_reviews.author: martinezaz

customer_reviews.title: Dreamline Great Qualty Great Price

Color:Brushed Stainless SteelDesign: Modern and luxurious, the DreamLine Enigma Air fully frameless sliding glass shower door, tub door, or shower enclosure delivers an open and spacious feeling with the perfect mix of exceptional quality and cool urban style. Glass: Premium 3/8" (10mm) thick clear tempered glass is treated with ClearMax anti-lime scale glass coating for superior protection and easy maintenance. Finish: Striking brushed stainless steel hardware finish. Rollers: Large wheel assembly creates effortless sliding action. Dimensions: 56-60" width (adjustable) x 76" height. Walk in shower opening: 22-26". Anti-splash threshold to prevent spills. Requires a minimum threshold depth of 2 ¼". Reversible for a right or left door opening. All measurements should be taken on finished walls only. Adjustments: Stainless Steel top guide bar can be trimmed up to 4" for width adjustment. Please note: this model has no adjustment for out-of-plumb (uneven) walls.Warranty: Limited Lifetime Manufacturer Warranty. Professional installation is required.
